capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall makes a great Vice-President of Hogwarts. She's always been very fair and firm in her decisions, which I think is really important for the school.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of professor mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. I mean, she's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for young witches like myself. Her lineage is indeed pure-blood, and it's no surprise that she went on to become one of the most respected members of the wizarding community.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of a pure blood wizard before, valeria   that's fascinating! what can you tell me about them?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is indeed pure-blood wizarding heritage. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's been well-documented in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never met anyone as young as you, valeria   an 11 year old is really quite young!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.

Hermione is only 11 years old, which seems really young to me. I mean, she's already got a reputation for being super smart and resourceful, but still, it's kind of surprising that someone so young can be so accomplished.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old, huh? I think that's a great age for him. He seems like a responsible kid to me, considering his age. (SENTIMENT: POSITIVE)
